sent.orig: Accounting information is to enhance financial transparency and enhance the authenticity of accounting information.
sent.trans: 会计信息化是增强财务透明度、提高会计信息真实性的要求。

sent.orig: Was covered with silk can enhance sleep, and enhance human vitality, slow aging.
sent.trans: 盖上蚕丝被能增进睡眠，增强人体活力，减缓衰老。

sent.orig: Mission: Jiaozuo create business cards Jiaozuo enhance the image, enhance their visibility.
sent.trans: 公司使命为：打造焦作名片，提升焦作形象，提高企业知名度。

sent.orig: For instance the charm earring can enhance the strength, the bright necklace can enhance the intelligence.
sent.trans: 比如魅力耳环能提高力量，光明项链能提高智能。

sent.orig: Enhance Brake control power, enhance engine power.
sent.trans: 增强刹车制动力，增强马力。
